TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IisTraceWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public NotInheritable Class IisTraceWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class IisTraceWebEventProvider sealed : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: Represents an event provider that routes ASP.NET tracing events to the IIS 7.0 infrastructure.

span.span: Represents an event provider that routes ASP.NET tracing events to the IIS 7.0 infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Permite que os administradores gerenciem de monitoramento de integridade ASP.NET implantado aplicativos da Web.ASP.NET health monitoring enables administrators to manage deployed Web applications. O namespace contém os tipos de evento que obtêm dados de status de integridade e os tipos de provedor que processam dados.The namespace contains the event types that obtain health-status data and the provider types that process this data. Ele também contém suporte a tipos que ajudam você gerenciam eventos de integridade.It also contains supporting types that help you manage health events. O classe é um provedor de evento de integridade personalizado que processa eventos de rastreamento do ASP.NET, roteá-los por meio de [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] infra-estrutura de rastreamento.The class is a customized health-event provider that processes ASP.NET tracing events by routing them through the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] tracing infrastructure. Este roteamento ocorre somente quando o rastreamento está habilitado no ASP.NET.This routing occurs only when tracing is enabled in ASP.NET. é introduzido no [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. Para saber mais, confira [Versões e dependências](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). > [!NOTE] > Essa classe não encaminhar [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] eventos da página de eventos de rastreamento em ASP.NET.This class does not route [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] trace events into ASP.NET page events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O construtor não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. Ele é chamado pelo ASP.NET.It is called by ASP.NET. é introduzido no [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

span.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando este método é chamado, todos os eventos no buffer imediatamente são movidos do buffer para o log de eventos.When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the event log. Isso ocorre independentemente de quanto tempo decorrido desde o último evento foi gravado ou quantos eventos no buffer.This occurs regardless of how much time has elapsed since the last event was written or how many events are in the buffer. A hora do último evento gravado é redefinida para o tempo da ação de liberação.The time of the last written event is reset to the time of the flushing action. é introduzido no [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. Para saber mais, confira [Versões e dependências](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: Performs tasks that are associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método realiza tarefas que permitem que o aplicativo terminar normalmente.The method performs tasks that enable the application to end normally. Um exemplo de uma tarefa está fechando recursos.An example of such a task is closing resources. é introduzido no [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
